io.micronaut.data.runtime.operations.internal

Class AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations<Cnt,RS,PS,Exc extends java.lang.Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.data.runtime.operations.internal.AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations<Cnt,RS,PS,Exc>
  • Type Parameters:
    Cnt - The connection type
    RS - The result set type
    PS - The prepared statement type
    Exc - The exception type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultJdbcRepositoryOperations, DefaultR2dbcRepositoryOperations

    @Internal
public abstract class AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations<Cnt,RS,PS,Exc extends java.lang.Exception>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract SQL repository implementation not specifically bound to JDBC.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    graemerocher, Denis Stepanov

      Simple function interface with two inputs and without return type.

      Implementation of AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations.StoredSqlOperation that retrieves data from AnnotationMetadata.

      Implementation of AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations.SqlOperation that uses bindging paths.
